FuncDef: The display anti-attack statistics command displays statistics about a specified type of attack defense. The display anti-attack statistics command displays statistics about a specified type of attack defense.
CLIs: display anti-attack statistics [ abnormal | fragment | tcp-syn | udp-flood | icmp-flood ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the statistics about defense against malformed packets.
-

Displays the statistics about defense against packet fragments.
-

Displays the statistics about defense against TCP SYN flood.
-

Displays the statistics about defense against UDP flood.
-

Displays the statistics about defense against ICMP flood.
-
